question: What is the most spoken constructed language in the world, and can you generate an image of its script?

steps.content: What is the most spoken constructed language in the world, and can you generate an image of its script?
Plan: 1) Search for the most spoken constructed language. 2) Generate an image of its script. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for the most spoken constructed language in the world.
Esperanto is the most spoken constructed language in the world.
Generating an image of Esperanto script.
Esperanto is the most spoken constructed language in the world. Image of Esperanto script generated.

true_answer: Esperanto is the most spoken constructed language in the world. Image of Esperanto script generated.
